model

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Enemy>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AverageJoe, BossMonster, FastCat, FatBoy

    public abstract class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Enemy>, java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class for all enemies to extend from Enemies have health, weight, armor, goldReward, and damage to player
    Author:
    Kyle
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove()
        Called from controller. Will decide where to move next. Controller should check after move to see if the enemy has gone off screen.
